Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to free tuition for New York state residents serving as volunteer firefighters at certain colleges
Summary: Makes tuition free for New York state residents serving as volunteer firefighters at SUNY and CUNY schools and community colleges.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing free SUNY, CUNY and community college tuition to volunteer firefighters
